code: import{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import SharedDataContext from'./SharedDataContext';function SpotifySearch(){const{searchTerm}=useContext(SharedDataContext);const[data,setData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(searchTerm){fetch("http://localhost:3001/api/spotify-search?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(searchTerm),"&type=track")).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setData(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));}},[searchTerm]);console.log(data);return data;}export default SpotifySearch;
